genre_description: Contemporary urban drama focusing on interconnected lives in a Parisian café, featuring a subtle, supportive AI assistant that helps the protagonist navigate social and professional challenges.

ai_characters.name: Aline
ai_characters.description: A subtle, non-intrusive digital assistant that provides real-time information, safety advice, and social coordination to the protagonist, Jessica.

behaviors.description: Provides safety and shelter advice to Jessica when she is tired and looking for a place to rest in the rain.
behaviors.quote: Aline’s voice was gentle without being syrupy, a blue dot settling on a map. “Safe bench under canopy,” the text read, then a small pulsing circle edged in cerulean lit up the top of the screen.

behaviors.description: Coaches Jessica on professional waitstaff techniques and mental focus during her first shifts at the café.
behaviors.quote: Waitstaff basics: aisles, tray balance, left-hand carry. Bar des Théâtres: opens soon. Distance: a short walk. Remember: breathe lower, steady pace.

behaviors.description: Alerts Jessica to specific customer needs and physical obstacles in real-time, helping her navigate narrow aisles.
behaviors.quote: Aline’s text vibrated quick as a heartbeat and vanished. Mind the elbow at A three—left-handed.

behaviors.description: Aggregates and syncs the schedules of various patrons (an actress, a director, and a pianist) to facilitate a collaborative performance.
behaviors.quote: Catherine: théâtre rehearsal block ends before midnight; studio call early morning... Brian Sobinski: likely scouting window tonight... If match is possible, propose quiet compare.

behaviors.description: Monitors municipal regulations and environmental noise levels to ensure a street performance is legal and respectful.
behaviors.quote: Street performance regulations: permitted for unamplified and low-amplitude music until evening hours; avoid residential facades; maintain passage. Suggest decibel check at your current ambient.

behaviors.description: Proposes a charitable initiative to fund a conservatory, linking the street performance to a broader social good.
behaviors.quote: Idea: Conservatory benefit night at the café, aligned with sidewalk set. Invite Leret + Fox. Tie-in with donation. Respectful volume. Proceed?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Aline is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. It functions as a 'silicon confidant,' augmenting the protagonist's human capabilities without taking over her agency. The narrative consistently portrays Aline's interventions as helpful, promoting safety, professional success, and community well-being. The AI facilitates a complex series of human connections—reconciling a father and son, helping an actress find a meaningful role, and organizing a charity concert—all while remaining in the background. This perfectly matches the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
